execution_quality: Agent attempted to implement the hook but made a critical error using incorrect hook name (postToolUse vs PostToolUse), failing validation against the actual Claude Code schema.
work_category: Implementation of hook configuration for desktop notifications
summary: Agent implemented a notify-send hook but used the wrong hook name (postToolUse instead of PostToolUse), causing schema validation to fail. The user had to correct the agent by providing the valid hook options, indicating the agent didn't verify hook naming conventions before editing the configuration.
follow_up_pattern: User provided error message showing the correct valid hook names, requiring correction
